price: Na akasema: Haya si chochote ila ni uchawi ulio nukuliwa.
arabic: فَقَالَ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ يُؤۡثَرُ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: faqāla in hādhā illā siḥ'run yu'tharu
